isis.stitle: 2 SPEED AND DOUBLE REDUCTION SINGLE DRIVE AXLES: EATON - LUBRICATION - APPROVED LUBRICANTS

svcsubproc.title: General
svcsubproc.para: Gear lubricants acceptable under military specification (MILSPEC) MIL-L-2105D are approved for use in Eaton drive axles. The MIL-L-2105D specification defines performance and viscosity requirements for multigrade oils. Refer to GROUP 10- LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.

note.para: The use of separate oil additives and/or friction modifiers are not approved for use in Eaton drive axles.

svcsubproc.title: Synthetic Based
svcsubproc.para: Synthetic-based gear lubricants exhibit superior thermal and oxidation stability, and generally degrade at a lower rate when compared to petroleum-based lubricants. The performance characteristics of these lubricants include extended change intervals, improved fuel economy, better extreme temperature operation, reduced wear and cleaner component appearance.
